name: Slipstream 100%
description:
Control a small VR toy airplane as it flies through levels with hand placed obstacles. Collect golden rings, listen to music and perform dangerous maneuvers to increase your score and fly higher than anyone else. Try all the levels and make it through with as many stickers as you can.

This game was made over 6 weeks as part of our study at SAE Brisbane. Our objective was to make a VR experience where the player would achieve a state of Flow.

Credits 

Game design and Programming: Simon Riber-Nielsen

Programming: Dante Eldin
